WEMO UPnP Devices¶

WEMO insight switch¶

Wemo Insight Smart Plug, Wi-Fi Enabled, Control Your Lights, Appliances and Manage Energy Costs From Your Phone, Works with Amazon Alexa

WEMO smart switch¶

WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

WEMO motion sensor¶

Belkin Wemo Home Automation Switch & Motion Sensor

WEMO mini switch¶

Wemo Mini Smart Plug, Wi-Fi Enabled, Works with Amazon Alexa

WEMO light¶

Wemo Light Switch, Wi-Fi enabled, Works with Amazon Alexa

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. UPnP devices will be auto discovered by Venus/Titan network

  2. To set-up WEMO devices, WEMO application is required with below steps:
    1. Reset WEMO device to change it to AP mode
    2. Connect mobile to WEMO device’s AP
    3. Open WEMO app
    4. Process set-up WEMO device to wifi network that Venus/Titan connected to

Reset UPnP device to AP mode¶

  1. Press and hold program button while powering
  2. Keep hold button until LED blinks orange and blue
